short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Write a message to someone, and encrypt it! Send the message and keys to someone for them to decrypt it and read it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can enter a message, and it will give you an encrypted value and 3 numbers(keys). You can send those to someone, and it can be decrypted and read.
